question: How can i gain weight and gain muslces?
question_content: Well im a skinny guy, kind of. I have a small muscles and big cabs, how can you have little arms and big legs? I want to balance my cab muscles and arm muscles. Please answer me :D tHANK YOU Im 13 years old, i weigh like 102-103 pounds and also i dont want to eat healthy foods to gain weight and muslces just regular food you buy from the grocery store.

answers.answer_content:
OK. You need to start eating more of the healthy food from the grocery store. Add milk to your diet. 1/2 - 1 gallon a day. Eat lots of protein: eggs, chicken, lean beef. Eat a lot of everything. To be big you need to eat big. Fat, too.

Next hit the weights, hard. Check out a good book on bodybuilding. Its called Scrawny to Brawny. It will show you the exercises to do and the food to eat. 

Good luck and good gaining,
Mel

Your too young 13 and worried about muscles forget about it. just do some cardio and may i recommend a high protein diet. Do more protein intake such as milk eggs chicken meats also drink some whey protein powder where you mix with water thats better because its low in fat, cholesteral. Take it and do alot of jogging you'll do good. But please dont do heavy lifting because it will stun your growth thats why they dont allow younger than 18yrs at the gym

try GOMAD. worked wonders for me. http://www.youtube.com/user/MannyRants
